doc.field: GREASE MONKEY [GMHC] GETS, REJECTS MERGER OFFER

- Grease Monkey Holding Corp said it has received and rejected an unsolicited merger offer from Jiffy Lube International Inc [LUBE]. The company said the proposal involved an exchange of Grease Monkey common stock for a combination of Jiffy Lube securities with an estimated current value substantially below Grease Monkey's current market price. It said it will not disclosed details.
